testcase.name: Validate User Registration
testcase.system-out: Given user click SignUp button..............................................passed When user enters basic information and navigates to Billing page............passed And user enters address information and navigates to confirmation screen....passed And user clicks confirm button..............................................passed And user click Login Here button............................................passed And user enter username and password and clicks Login button................passed Then "Medicare - Home" page should be displayed.............................passed

testcase.name: Validate Paracetamol Product Purchase
testcase.system-out: When users clicks View button for Paracetamol...............................passed And user clicks Add to Cart.................................................passed And user clicks Checkout....................................................passed And user selects saved shippig address......................................passed And user enters credit card informartion and click pay......................passed Then "Your Order is Confirmed!!" message should be displayed................passed

testcase.name: Add a category and verify in database
testcase.system-out: Given user logged in with admin username "vk@gmail.com" and password "admin".passed When user click on Manage Product and selects Add New Category..............passed And user provides Category name and description and saves it................passed Then verify category "Mycategory001" and description "MyCategorydesc002" should be saved to database.passed
